title: Student Risk Screening and Personalized Support Strategies Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Current secondary school teachers practice applying learning analytics in simulated/VR environments to diagnose and support student risks in real classroom settings, with a focus on real-time data collection and analysis using personal devices.

learning_goals: Effort-based metrics like student engagement and task completion rates can be measured and interpreted using learning analytics tools
Student risk assessment models reflecting dynamic risk factors (e.g., weekly learning pattern changes) can be designed
Customized support strategies can be developed and applied based on student risk screening results in VR-based simulation environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
